message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $6,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $6,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $6,900. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I can consider $6,800 as a fair price for me. I hope we can reach a mutual agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go down to $6,950. It's a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll love the product.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet my price range. Considering your last offer, I am willing to pay $6,900 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
